000: I guess there must be around hundred vehicles on the terrain. This is row of trucks. Trucks with a loading platform were loaded with Land Rovers.
002: More trucks on the right and on the left a weird-looking military vehicle.
004: Detail of the installation of a fuel-transporting truck.
005: There were loads more interesting trucks and other vehicles. But they were all parked so close to each other it wasn't possible to take nice pictures of them.
